DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Russian Federation . This trial aim comparison effect glycemic control subject type 2 diabetes three different treatment regimen : biphasic insulin aspart 30 thrice daily , biphasic insulin aspart 30 twice daily combination metformin treatment oral anti-diabetic drug .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Biphasic Insulin Aspart 30 Blood Glucose Control Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
Insulin aspart , insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes , currently treat one oral hypoglycemic agent HbA1c : At least 8.0 % Impaired hepatic , renal cardiac function
